title: Social Competency Enhancement Education Course Utilizing Gamification

context.additional_context: Ensures accessibility via a simplified smartphone-based game interface, combining face-to-face workshops with mobile learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can design social problem-solving scenarios with over 80% accuracy using gamification elements
Learners can improve collaboration efficiency with peers by over 30% through in-game interaction mechanisms
Learners analyze their social decision-making patterns and develop improvement plans using a feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
